tool.name: AddOrReplaceReadGroups
tool.description: add or replaces read group information
tool.command:
@java_options@ java -jar \$JAVA_JAR_PATH/picard.jar AddOrReplaceReadGroups INPUT="${inputFile}" RGLB="${rglb}" RGPL="${rgpl}" RGPU="${rgpu}" RGSM="${rgsm}" RGID="${rgid}"
#if str( $rgcn): RGCN="${rgcn}" #end if
#if str( $rgds): RGDS="${rgds}" #end if
#if str( $rgpi): RGPI="${rgpi}" #end if
#if str( $rgdt): RGDT="${rgdt}" #end if
VALIDATION_STRINGENCY="${validation_stringency}" QUIET=true VERBOSITY=ERROR OUTPUT="${outFile}"
@TMP_DIR_FIX@

param.name: inputFile
param.label: Select SAM/BAM dataset or dataset collection
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM/BAM dataset

param.name: rgpl
param.label: Read Group Platform
param.help: RGPL; Required; e.g., Illumina, 454, IonTorrent, etc

param.name: rgpu
param.label: Read Group Platform Unit
param.help: RGPU; Required; e.g., run, barcode, etc
